creator: EOMDOM
descriptionHtml:
---GAME FEATURES---

Weapon
You can register for 4slots in advance and choose one of them during the battle.
Choose the most effective weapon for the situation.
There are 12 weapons in total.
Weapons can be obtained by defeating enemies.

affix of a weapon
Weapons can have up to three affixes, such as "Rate of fire", "Magazine capacity", "Critical chance", etc.

ULT
Earn ULT points by killing enemies and attacking with critical attacks.
Once you have accumulated enough, you can use the ULT attack.
ULT works differently for different weapons.

character level
When you discard a weapon, you gain experience based on its weapon level.
By accumulating experience and raising your character level, you can increase your weapon's attack power, maximum HP, and HP recovery.


---Weapon Description---

[Revolver]
Normal:It is highly susceptible to distance decay and has little magazine capasity, but it is a weapon with high one-shot power
ULT:Fires six very powerful bullets at random.

[Assault]
Normal:It's not very powerful, but it can shoot a lot of bullets in a short time.
ULT:Eliminate all enemies with support attacks from helicopters.

[RPG]
Normal:Explodes upon impact, damaging surrounding enemies.
ULT:Shoot gravity bombs that will suck in all the enemies.

[Stun]
Normal:It does no damage, but stuns surrounding enemies. This effect may be resisted by stronger enemies.
ULT:Put all enemies to sleep. This effect is not resisted, but will be woken up by an attack.

[Sniper]
Normal:It can't fire continuously, but it can do very high damage at long range.
ULT:Our friends with the same weapon will rush to you.

[Shotgun]
Normal::It's mostly limited to short distances, but it does a lot of damage with great power and range.
ULT:A series of high-powered attacks, yet with a knockback effect.

[Napalm]
Normal:Causes the surrounding enemies to burst into flames. Enemies in flames will gradually lose their health.
ULT:Enemies on fire will explode.

[Break]
Normal:Reduces the defense of enemies hit by the attack. This effect may be resisted by stronger enemies.
ULT:Reduces the defense of all enemies. This effect will not be resisted.

[Weak]
Normal:Reduces the attack power of the enemy hit. This effect may be resisted by stronger enemies.
ULT:Reduces the attack power of all enemies. This effect will not be resisted.

[Mine]
Normal:Place mines that explode when stepped on by enemies. These mines will not become active until a few seconds after they are placed.
ULT:The mines will split.

[Wall]
Normal:Set up a wall that resembles a barrel. This wall will obstruct the enemy's progress.
ULT:The wall will split.

[Meat]
Normal:Defeating enemies with this weapon will give you meat that will restore your HP.
ULT:All enemies are cursed with meat. Defeating this cursed enemy will give you meat.
descriptionShort: Switch weapons according to the situation and defeat the enemies come at you
title: Vermin Clear
